About.title: About me
About.subtitle: More than just a web developer,<linebreak> </linebreak> i build meaningful digital experiences that connect ideas and people.
About.descriptionForName: I was born in <highlight>2003</highlight> and graduated in <highlight>Computer Engineering</highlight> from <highlight>Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology and Education (HCMUTE)</highlight>. I have a great passion for web development and continuously learn new technologies to build high-quality and useful digital products.
About.descriptionForSkill: I am experienced in modern web development using <highlight>ReactJS</highlight>, <highlight>NextJS</highlight>, and <highlight>NodeJS</highlight>, and have a strong interest in <highlight>SEO optimization</highlight>. I also have solid English communication skills, demonstrated by a <highlight>TOEIC</highlight> score of <highlight>760/990</highlight>.

subtitle.part2: I transform ideas into real-world solutions through continuous learning and collaboration.

subtitle.part1: Each project is a step in my journey,
subtitle.part2: helping me learn and create meaningful web experiences
